name: Soar (zach kowaliczko)
description:
As a knight gifted with the power of flight, you travel to the Forbidden Land on a quest to find a mythical paradise.

(Couple of things to know before you play:)

1) When you pause the game, the mouse still controls the camera, but the game is still paused.

2) When you collect the final orb, the counter will reset to zero, but it will still recognize that you collected the final orb & the end of the game will still be accessible.
